directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, chiles, Seasoning Mix and 1/4 cup of the shredded cheese in large bowl until well blended. Stir in chicken.
Place tostada bowls on foil-lined baking sheet. Spoon dip evenly into the 2 tostada bowls.
Top each bowl with remaining 1/4 cup shredded cheese.
Bake 25 minutes or until heated through. Serve with desired toppings and tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1/2 cup McCormick® Mayonnaise with Lime Juice (Mayonesa) or mayonnaise
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, undrained
1/2 cup shredded Mexican cheese blend, divided
title: Arizona Cheesy Chimichanga Dip
